page.title: 05BAWDRIP CHURCH
page.content: Bawdrip church dates from the 13th. century.It is called St. Michael and all Angels.The church is opposite the school. In the church are some interesting things.There is the tomb of Sir Simon da Bradney who was a crusader.It has a stone statue of him lying down.There some medieval heads holding up stone arches. There is a bell tower with six bells.From the log book we find that the east window above the altar was dedicated in 1907.The organ was rebuilt about 6 years ago.It is a pretty church but small.
